title: Live NRL: Broncos v Raiders
text:
Live NRL: Brisbane Broncos v Canberra Raiders blog, scores, updates March 24, 2017 6:38pm Source: FOX SPORTS IT’S a battle of the big men up in Brisbane as the Broncos take on a Canberra side coming in with some hot form. 
The young Broncos forward pack led by Korbin Sims and boasting the likes of Tevita Pangai Junior, Herman Ese’ese and Jai Arrow off the bench goes head to head with big boppers Junior Paulo, Shannon Boyd, Josh Papalii and Dave Taylor. 
Live stream round four of the NRL premiership on FOX SPORTS. Get your free 2-week FOXTEL PLAY trial and start watching in minutes. SIGN UP NOW! 
Match Centre : Broncos v Raiders 
The Broncos’ season record sits 1-2 but they’ve lost two tight ones, while the Raiders flogged the Wests Tigers 46-6 to send an ominous warning to the competition. 
Anthony Milford goes up against his former club in a week when it was revealed he’s poised to sign a lucrative contract extension with Brisbane. 
Can the Broncos get a ‘W’ on the board against some stiff competition?
